name: The Entombment
description: The Entombment; Luca Penni (Italian, 1500/1504 - 1556); about 1550; Black chalk, pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash, heightened with white gouache; 43 x 60 cm (16 15/16 x 23 5/8 in.); 85.GG.235; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Entombment
medium: Black chalk, pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash, heightened with white gouache
